items.sentence: Since we had no school today, I stayed home and watched TV all day.
Although I grew up on a farm, I don\'t know much about agriculture.
Can you tell me how you found out that Tom wasn\'t at school today?
Has Tom told Mary that he doesn\'t really know how to speak French?
Tom threatened to kill Mary if she told anyone about what happened.
Tom was leaning against the porch railing with a drink in his hand.
Tom doesn\'t get along with the other children in the neighborhood.
Tom knew that Mary didn\'t know that John was going to marry Alice.
If Tom had understood French, he would\'ve known what was going on.
Tom wanted to introduce himself in French, but he didn\'t know how.
